oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Clarksville-Montgomery County Consolidated Government Charter Commission: Council and Executive Subcommittee Meeting Minutes, 1980
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Chairman Frank McGregor and the Council and Executive Subcommittee held three official meetings between February and March 1980. Topics discussed include the activities of legislative committees in the proposed consolidated government.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Community development; Metropolitan government; Municipal charters; Government executives; Meetings
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: 1980 Charter Commission
